ayas.translation: When the earth is rocked with a terrible quake
and man says, ‘What is the matter with her?’
On that day she will relate her chronicles
for her Lord will have inspired her.

ayas.arabic: يَوْمَئِذٍ يَصْدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشْتَاتًا لِّيُرَوْا۟ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ
ayas.translation: On that day, mankind will issue forth in various groups to be shown their deeds.
ayas.transliteration: yawma-idhiy yaṣdurun nāsu ashtātal liyuraw a`mālahum

ayas.arabic: فَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًا يَرَهُۥ
ayas.translation: So whoever does an atom’s weight of good will see it,
ayas.transliteration: faman ya`mal mithqāla dharratin khayran yarah

ayas.arabic: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ شَرًّا يَرَهُۥ
ayas.translation: and whoever does an atom’s weight of evil will see it.
ayas.transliteration: wa man ya`mal mithqāla dharratin sharran yarah
